bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names gu zheng lao 骨蒸勞 , exhaustion because of bone steaming; fu lian 伏連 , hidden link. Pathological Condition of an infectious consumptive disease. The Song-era physician Chen Yan 陳 言 believed it to be identical with lao zhai 勞瘵 , exhaustion consumption. Qian jin yi fang 千金翼方 20: Recipe Entry da jin ya san 大金牙散 , massive powder with jin ya : 傳屍骨蒸 病家合，佳 , “All members of a household with patients suffering from corpse [evil] transmission and bone steaming should prepare [this medication]; very good”.
